channel.title: CVE Feed for ali2woo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ali2woo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37212|2024-08-02T03:50:55.066Z -- ali2woo -- ali2woo%20lite
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Ali2Woo Ali2Woo Lite.This issue affects Ali2Woo Lite: from n/a through 3.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-2381|2024-08-01T19:11:53.462Z -- ali2woo -- aliexpress%20dropshipping%20with%20alinext%20lite
item.description: The AliExpress Dropshipping with AliNext Lite plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the ajax_save_image function in all versions up to, and including, 3.3.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-4450|2024-06-25T17:17:31.883Z -- ali2woo -- aliexpress%20dropshipping%20with%20alinext%20lite
item.description: The AliExpress Dropshipping with AliNext Lite plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on several functions in the ImportAjaxController.php file in all versions up to, and including, 3.3.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to perform several actions like importing and modifying products.

item.title: CVE-2024-2381|2024-06-19T03:12:32.995Z -- ali2woo -- aliexpress%20dropshipping%20with%20alinext%20lite
item.description: The AliExpress Dropshipping with AliNext Lite plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the ajax_save_image function in all versions up to, and including, 3.3.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2024-4450|2024-06-19T03:12:27.467Z -- ali2woo -- aliexpress%20dropshipping%20with%20alinext%20lite
item.description: The AliExpress Dropshipping with AliNext Lite plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on several functions in the ImportAjaxController.php file in all versions up to, and including, 3.3.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to perform several actions like importing and modifying products.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Ali2Woo Ali2Woo Lite.This issue affects Ali2Woo Lite: from n/a through 3.3.5.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Ali2Woo Ali2Woo Lite.This issue affects Ali2Woo Lite: from n/a through 3.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-4450|2024-08-01T20:40:47.189Z -- ali2woo -- aliexpress%20dropshipping%20with%20alinext%20lite
item.description: The AliExpress Dropshipping with AliNext Lite plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on several functions in the ImportAjaxController.php file in all versions up to, and including, 3.3.5. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to perform several actions like importing and modifying products.
